Posts.Content: Best of luck with your surgery tomorrow. I would rely on the health care professionals to let you know if you should proceed or not. Proceed as if it will happen and let the situation fall where it may. It is amazing to me how stress can bring on a cold. I usually get one before I travel. I'm hoping the psychological suggestion of your situation won't affect me! Let us know how it goes! Mine is a week from Thursday.
Posts.Signature: Age 52 RRP 11-5-09 Post Surgical Gleason 3+4 = 7 Stage T1C Pre-surgical PSA: 5.3 Post-surgical PSA: Undetectable at 13 weeks
Posts.Title: Robotic Surgery tomorrow morning, emergency question!

Posts.Content: Great to hear from you so soon! I'm looking forward to your postings of the first few days post surgery. I met with my surgeon today so it's beginning to feel real for me. How's your pain with the morphine?
